column1: The Purple Pig////As one of then city's staples
column2: Purple Pig is one of the more affordable options comparatively
column3: but it'll still leave a dent in your wallet. Thus
column4: best practice is to come with a small group of friends (4-6 people) and agree on splitting all the items so that everyone can have a piece of the goodness. We came on a Saturday morning right as they opened and managed to snag a table within a couple of minutes.
